docs.title: Home

docs.text: Authors This documentation was created by Philipp A. Witte ( pwitte3@gatech.edu ) from the Georgia Institute of Technology. People involved in the development of JUDI include: Philipp A. Witte (Georgia Institute of Technology) Mathias Louboutin (Georgia Institute of Technology) Henryk Modzelewski (The Univeristy of British Columbia) Felix J. Herrmann (Georgia Institute of Technology) The research of this project was carried out at the Seismic Laboratory for Imaging and Modeling (SLIM) at the Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, USA and at the University of British Columbia (UBC), in Vancouver, Canada.
